summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2388, for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northwest from West 65th Street to West 67th Street, and West 65th Street, from 11th Avenue Northwest to 15th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24848 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
